mapper.sql: c.id as carriage_id, c.train_id, c.manufacturer, c.seat_capacity, c.carriage_number
mapper.select: select from carriages c left join trains t on c.train_id = t.id where c.id = #{id} ;
mapper.insert: insert into carriages (train_id, manufacturer, seat_capacity, carriage_number) values (#{trainId}, #{carriage.manufacturer}, #{carriage.seatCapacity}, #{carriage.number});
